backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing access control, membership tiers, and user profile management using ordered maps with admin-restricted mutations.
backend/migration.mo: Defines old and new actor state structures for data migration across many domain modules including tiers, profiles, bookings, products, and configuration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a specific admin slots UI update to affected frontend files and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing all frontend files, their responsibilities, and UI behavior.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the root React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring router routes, theme provider, authentication handling, and profile setup modal logic.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen that displays an access denied message with a button to return home when a user lacks permissions.
frontend/src/components/AvailabilityMana: Admin time slot management panel enabling creation of 30‑minute slots and bulk or individual updates to availability and live visibility states.
frontend/src/components/BookingExtension: UI for staff to extend a booking by 15 minutes using a mutation and displays success or error toasts.
frontend/src/components/BusinessContactI: Panel to view and update business contact info with form fields synced to backend via queries and mutations.
frontend/src/components/InviteAdminPanel: Admin invitation tool that creates invitation records, composes shareable messages, and offers device-aware sharing options.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main app layout with navigation, authentication handling, admin checks, and responsive menus.
frontend/src/components/LoyaltyPointsSet: Settings panel allowing admins to enable or disable awarding loyalty points for promotional bookings.
frontend/src/components/MembershipManage: CRUD interface for managing membership tiers, including creation, editing, validation, and backend syncing.
frontend/src/components/NotificationBann: Shows the most recent unread notification, allows dismissing it, and marks it as read.
frontend/src/components/NotificationCent: Provides a sliding panel to view, mark read, and delete notifications with unread count display.
frontend/src/components/PointsCategories: Manages creation, editing, and deletion of points categories with form validation and API mutations.
frontend/src/components/ProductManagemen: Form for adding new products with name, price, category, and stock, submitting them via API.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for initial user profile creation, collecting name and email and saving via API.
frontend/src/components/StripeConfigPane: Configures Stripe payment settings including secret key and allowed countries, submitting them to the backend.
frontend/src/components/VenueInfoPanel.t: Form to update venue details such as name, location, and hours, sending changes to the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout handlers, and initializes AuthClient with stored or new identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for user profiles, membership tiers, points categories, and other CRUD operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for a green‑and‑gold light/dark theme with UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Displays the admin dashboard with tabs for managing memberships, points, availability, products, and other venue settings.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPage.tsx: Lets authenticated users view time slots, make bookings, and see earned loyalty points with supporting UI and validations.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing hero content, feature cards, and top reviews with navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Displays player leaderboard with podium for top 3 and a full ranked list from fetched data.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPage.tsx: Shows membership details, tiers, rewards, and handles checkout for upgrades with authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows payment cancellation message with navigation options back to store or home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Shows successful payment confirmation and links to view orders or return home.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays user profile info, membership badges, and tabs for viewing bookings and orders.
frontend/src/pages/ReviewsPage.tsx: Lists user reviews and provides a form for authenticated users to submit new ratings and comments.
frontend/src/pages/StorePage.tsx: Implements a store page that lists products by category, manages a shopping cart, and triggers checkout using a backend session API.
frontend/src/pages/VenueInfoPage.tsx: Displays venue details, contact info, FAQs, and rules using data from venue and business info APIs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks the project’s feature set, requirements, known issues, and current architectural notes for booking and admin systems.
